amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Office of the U.S. Trade Representative by $1 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 22 in the Congressional Record of September 9, 1997 to increase funding for the office of the U.S. Trade Representative by $1 million and to reduce funding for general administrative expenses within the Department of Commerce commensurately.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sanders amendment (A015) Agreed to by recorded vote: 356 - 64 (Roll no. 452).
